name: The Fifty-Ninth Minute
description:
This is a game about someone who waited until the last minute.

 Use WSAD to move and space to jump.  Everything else is up to you to learn.

Hope you like it. Its my first game that I made with Unity. I learned a lot along the way and I'm glad I did this!

I made this for the Game Development Club's Game Jam at my college. Most assets, including sprites, music, and scripting was made by me during the Game Jam. The title graphic was made by CalisKim (YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCCKATqy-QbCRtURpMXzo-yg Deviantart: https://www.deviantart.com/caliskim).
